column2: Press menu button to\n open controller menu.
Press START to begin\n the Learning Process.
Press SELECT GRAB Button

Touch the target object
 with the controller. 
 
 Press and hold 
 the trigger.

Hold trigger and move 
 object to target area. 

 Release trigger to drop 
 the object.
Press menu button to \n open controller menu.
Press USE SNAP to \n enable the snapping mode.
Press menu button to \n close controller menu.

Touch the target

  the controller.

 the trigger.

 now snap to 
  the controller.

Move object to target 
 area while holding
 trigger. 
 
 Release trigger to

Press USE SNAP to \n disable the snapping mode

 Release trigger to

Press the SELECT GRAB Button.

Touch the target

 the wand.

Press menu button to \n open controller menu.
Press SELECT GRAB Button.

The cursor is 
 green if the object 
 is selectable. 
 
 The length of the ray 
 will fit automatically 
 or can be adjusted 
 by pushing the object 
  on the ground. 
 
 Point the ray 
 to the target object. 
 
  Press and hold 
 the trigger.

Move object to target
  area while holding 
 the trigger. 
 
 Release trigger to 
 drop the object.
Press menu button to \n open controller menu.
Press SELECT GRAB Button.

Press on top/buttom of 
 touchpad to 
 extend/shorten ray. 

 Touch the target object 
 with the ray. 
 
  Press and hold 
 the trigger.

Move object to 
 target area while 
 holding the trigger. 
 
 Adjust the ray 
 to required length 
 with the touchpad. 
 
 Release trigger to 
 drop the object.
Press menu button to \n open controller menu.

Press SHOW TIPS to 
 switch the tips on/off. 
 
 Choose a specific method 
 to train until you feel 
 secure with it. 
  
 Repeat this for every method 
 you feel unconfident with it. 

 Press STOP to end 
 the learning process,
 if you feel confindent 
 with every method.

Walk on the appearing 
 red area to switch to 
 the study scene. 
 
 It is a supermarket!
